508000.name: Robotpencil Presents: Female Portrait Demo
508000.description:
Female Portraits is about 35 minutes long and covers how one can go about painting a female face with a bit more confidence. Here are topics that will be covered.

Why are they sometimes more fun

The Difficulties of softness

Believable features and light make up

Add some flavor and mix up the hair
508000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
